com.emc.vipr.client.core.search

Class SearchBuilder<T extends DataObjectRestRep>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emc.vipr.client.core.search.SearchBuilder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Resource type returned by this search builder.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApprovalSearchBuilder, OrderSearchBuilder, ProjectSearchBuilder, VirtualArraySearchBuilder

    public class SearchBuilder<T extends DataObjectRestRep>
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder for search queries.

      • filter

        public SearchBuilder<T> filter(ResourceFilter<T> addFilter)
        Filters the results returned by the search query. Multiple filters can be added.
        Parameters:
        addFilter - Filter to use for filtering the search results.
        Returns:
        This SearchBuilder.

      • byName

        public SearchBuilder<T> byName(java.lang.String name)
        Shortcut to search by name.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the resource.
        Returns:
        This SearchBuilder.

      • byExactName

        public SearchBuilder<T> byExactName(java.lang.String name)
        Shortcut to search by exact name. This both searches by name and adds a filter to ensure the exact name string is matched.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the resource.
        Returns:
        This SearchBuilder.

      • byTag

        public SearchBuilder<T> byTag(java.lang.String tag)
        Shortcut to search by tag.
        Parameters:
        tag - Tag on the resource.
        Returns:
        This SearchBuilder.

      • first

        public T first()
        Runs a search based on the criteria built with this SearchBuilder. Only the first search result is returned.
        Returns:
        The first search result.

      • run

        public java.util.List<T> run()
        Runs a search based on the criteria built with this SearchBuilder. All search results are queried and returned.
        Returns:
        All search results.
